Lasagna

Description

Lasagna is a classic Italian dish that combines layers of rich pasta, savory meat or vegetables, and creamy béchamel sauce, all topped with melted cheese for a comforting, hearty meal. Each layer is carefully constructed to create a harmonious blend of flavors and textures, from the tender pasta to the rich tomato sauce. Whether made with ground beef, sausage, or a mix of fresh vegetables, lasagna is a dish that brings people together around the table.

Baked to perfection, lasagna is the ultimate comfort food, ideal for family dinners or special occasions. The combination of flavors only improves with time, making it even more delicious as leftovers. Whether you prefer a traditional recipe or a creative twist with unique ingredients, lasagna remains a timeless favorite for satisfying appetites and warming hearts.

Ingredients

  • Ground Beef Mince
  • Tomatoo Puree
  • Mozzarella Cheese
  • Lasagna Sheets
  • Plus other stuff, this is just a practice

Steps

  1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)
  2. Line tray with first lasagna sheet
  3. etc.......
